times have changed

Media consumption has changed. The rise of mobile also changed the way people consume content. Snapchat has lead the way with the vertical format, Instagram Stories, Facebook and recently even YouTube followed.

Whether you like it or not: consumers don't turn their phones to view video. With a background in Influencer Marketing and with a profound classic production expertise TRUEMATES is here to create state-of-the-art content.

Whether you like it or not: consumers don't turn their phones to view video. With a background in Influencer Marketing and with a profound classic production expertise TRUEMATES is here to create state-of-the-art content.

WE ARE NOT JUST ANOTHER FILMPRODUCTION

We focus on creating and producing high quality content for social media - foto, film and much more in between.

WE PRODUCE CAMPAIGNS

Productions involving influencers, film, photo, cinemagraphs, instagram stories ads, snapchat content, vlogs, bumper ads, prerolls, gifs - every format you can imagine and more formats you haven’t heard of yet.

WE ARE YOU PARTNER

We create concepts, work on your ideas, advise you to get the best for your campaign.

WE’RE NO ROOKIES

We’ve been working in the game of professional commercial film and photo production for years. We are a good crowd of producers, film directors, photographers, cinematographers and art directors - and we are super enthusiastic about being pioneers in the field of modern commercial production.

BOTTOMLINE

High quality commercial standard meets fast and effective ways of production meets an understanding of todays way of communication meets your new best friends in Berlin.
